title: Drawing, "Design for Armchair", 1927
medium: Graphite, brush and yellow-beige watercolor on illustration board
markings: Embossed artist's monogram, upper right: EB
inscribed:
Upper left, in graphite: 3 (encircled) $750
Lowe right: wood covered / galuchant / (lizard) / white ... color / 3 (encircled) / E. Boiceau
description:
Open-armed chair, wood covered in lizard, straight front legs, splayed back legs.

Note: invoice in drawing folder records Fouteuil No. 3 frs. 9.500 ($750)

Inscriptions: in graphite, upper left: 3 (encircled) $750
Lower right: wood covered / galuchant / white ... color / 3 (encircled) / E. Boiceau

Embossed artist's monogram, upper right: EB

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Armchair", 1927. Graphite, brush and yellow-beige watercolor on illustration board. 1954-69-2.
